body.p: Reports: “Deletion of Atoh1 disrupts Sonic Hedgehog signaling in the developing cerebellum and prevents medulloblastoma” by A. Flora et al. (4 December 2009, p. 1424). Reference 3 should instead cite: M. C. Thompson et al., J. Clin. Oncol. 24, 1924 (2006).

News Focus: “Sex and social structure” by E. Pennisi (23 October 2009, p. 518). Mary Jane West-Eberhard should have been listed as affiliated with the Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute in Panama.

Research Articles: “Macrovertebrate paleontology and the pliocene habitat of Ardipithecus ramidus” by T. D. White et al. (2 October 2009, p. 67). The beginning of the description of panel (C) in the Fig. 1 caption on p. 88 should read, “(C) Total NISP. The NISP value reflects all collected specimens identified to taxon and excludes bulk specimens. Associated dental…”
